propositions.original_proposition: Electric vehicle registrations peak 30% higher in inner London boroughs during summer months from 2020 to 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Inner London boroughs see a noticeable surge in electric vehicle registrations during the summer months over recent years.
propositions.chart_title: Summer Surge in EV Registrations in Inner London
propositions.chart_description: Trends in electric vehicle registrations in inner London from 2020 to 2023.
propositions.reasoning: A line chart effectively illustrates trends over time, highlighting seasonal peaks in registrations.
tapas_questions: Which borough has the highest electric vehicle registrations during summer?
How do electric vehicle registrations in inner London compare to outer London?
What is the trend of electric vehicle registrations from 2020 to 2023?

propositions.original_proposition: Hybrid vehicles show a 20% increase in registrations in outer London boroughs during winter months from 2019 to 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Hybrid vehicle registrations have steadily increased in outer London boroughs during the winter months over recent years.
propositions.chart_title: Hybrid Vehicle Registrations in Outer London
propositions.chart_description: Trend of hybrid vehicle registrations in outer boroughs from 2019 to 2023.
propositions.reasoning: A line chart effectively shows the trend of increasing hybrid vehicle registrations over time, highlighting seasonal patterns.
tapas_questions: Which borough has the highest increase in hybrid vehicle registrations?
How do hybrid vehicle registrations in outer boroughs compare to inner boroughs?
What is the trend of hybrid vehicle registrations from 2019 to 2023?
